project.name: C-C400A-FFMP-03-ST04-DT04-DF11-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C400A-FFMP-03-ST04-DT04-DF11-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Read an int from the input. If < 0, or bigger than 0xFFFFFFFF/4, do nothing. Otherwise, malloc that many 100,000 int buffers. If memory cannot all be allocated, output 'Out of memory' then exit. This condition occurs if int > about 30000

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 7235 -s 7 -m "0" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_lftd9yH0IJZwozNxX0KT AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_i6Nwewgtb9 OR (NOT finished_ed2CgB4Oui AND NOT (controlled_exit_scef6Jotbb OR continued_execution_2hO6Hwz7Vg)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_i6Nwewgtb9 OR (NOT finished_ed2CgB4Oui AND NOT (controlled_exit_scef6Jotbb OR continued_execution_2hO6Hwz7Vg))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_i6Nwewgtb9 OR (NOT finished_ed2CgB4Oui AND NOT (controlled_exit_scef6Jotbb OR continued_execution_2hO6Hwz7Vg)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_i6Nwewgtb9 OR (NOT finished_ed2CgB4Oui AND NOT (controlled_exit_scef6Jotbb OR continued_execution_2hO6Hwz7Vg)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
